org.eclipse.golo.compiler.parser

Class JavaOffsetCharStream

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.eclipse.golo.compiler.parser.JavaCharStream
      • org.eclipse.golo.compiler.parser.JavaOffsetCharStream

  • public class JavaOffsetCharStream
extends JavaCharStream
    JavaCharStream extension allowing to track token offsets.
